dcp.AddNormalLuckToPool: Add Normal Luck to Fudge Pool
dcp.AddMinimalLuckToPool: Add Min Luck to Fudge Pool
dcp.AddMaximalLuckToPool: Add Max Luck to Fudge Pool
dcp.AddLowLuckToPool: Add Low Luck to Fudge Pool
dcp.AddHighLuckToPool: Add High Luck to Fudge Pool

keybindings.toggledicetray: Affiche/Cache la barre dans le chat

onlyforplayer.name: Only for player
onlyforplayer.hint: Protect the dice random generator only for players.

enabledicetray.name: Enable Dice tray
enabledicetray.hint: Show Dice tray in the chat log (see keybindings)

enablefudgedicepool.name: Fudge reserve for the GM
enablefudgedicepool.hint: The GM can modify his Fudge pool.

poolsize.name: Capacity of the pool
poolsize.hint: For performance, generates an array of random numbers and regenerates it as needed
